Ebbro 44140 Nissan Skyline 2000 GT-R (KPGC10) 1972 Fuji Masters 250km 16th Place S. Seitani

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer Page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44140.html

As previously mentioned here, Nissan was out for revenge on Mazda in 1972. SakaeKuni Seitani was one of the original Prince Motor Club•Sports (PMC•S) drivers and raced for Nissan in the yellow #17 car.


(photo from: SPIRIT OF SKYLINE)

Seitani went on to finish 16th overall in the race. Seitani had a relatively short career of 30 races - all at Fuji & 29 in a Skyline :!: - but never won a race.
